text: She gave birth to her first child, and Cristiano Ronaldo's fourth, on the 12th November. And less than three weeks after welcoming baby girl Alana Martina with her footballer boyfriend, Georgina Rodriguez was pictured flaunting her incredible post - baby body. The model, 22, stepped out in Madrid on Friday without her 32 - year - old beau, showcasing her washboard stomach in gym gear. Yummy mummy!
